TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit WebPermission extends System.Security.CodeAccessPermission implements class System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission
Public NotInheritable Class WebPermission Inherits CodeAccessPermission Implements IUnrestrictedPermission
public ref class WebPermission sealed : System::Security::CodeAccessPermission, System::Security::Permissions::IUnrestrictedPermission

summary.span: 控制访问 HTTP Internet 资源的权限。

span.span: Controls rights to access HTTP Internet resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供一组方法和属性来控制对 Internet 资源的访问。 provides a set of methods and properties to control access to Internet resources. 你可以使用以提供对你的资源的受限制或不受限制访问基于时会设置创建。You can use a to provide either restricted or unrestricted access to your resource, based on the that is set when the is created. 创建实例通过调用其构造函数使用下列选项之一设置的参数：Create a instance by calling its constructor using one of the following sets of parameters: - 无参数。No parameters. 默认的 为 。The default is . - 。A . 指定以允许在目标类中，使用任何 URI 或以允许仅对使用指定的 Uri 访问方法。Specify either to allow any URI to be used in the target class, or to allow access only to URIs that you specify through the use of the method. - A值和 URI 字符串。A value and a URI string. 指定的 URI 已授予的权限值。The specified URI has permissions granted by the value. - A说明符和 URI 正则表达式。A specifier and URI regular expression. 和保存已向其授予访问权限的 Uri。The and hold the URIs to which you have granted access permission. 若要将 URI 添加到其中任何一个列表，请使用。To add a URI to either of these lists, use . 如果你通过作为参数，URI 将添加到。If you pass as the parameter, the URI will be added to the . 将允许连接到你的目标类与 Uri 匹配。 will allow connections to your target class with URIs matching the . > [!CAUTION] > 若要拒绝对 Internet 资源的访问，你必须拒绝访问对该资源的所有可能路径。To deny access to an Internet resource, you must deny access to all the possible paths to that resource. 这需要调用状态参数设置为。This requires calling with state parameter set to . 更好的方法是允许访问特定资源的权限。A better approach is to allow access to the specific resource only. 有关此主题的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用 Deny 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6b4d2e01-c504-4ac3-b50e-d6f5e7f5df25)主题。For more information about this subject, refer to the [NIB: Using the Deny Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6b4d2e01-c504-4ac3-b50e-d6f5e7f5df25) topic. > [!NOTE] > 你需要为拒绝使用仅规范的资源路径的访问。You need to deny access using only the resource canonical path. 没有无需使用的路径的所有语法变体。There is no need to use all the path's syntactical variations. > [!NOTE] > 用户名称和默认端口的信息从中提取出来之前与提供给正则表达式参数的比较结果构造函数。User name and default port information is stripped from the before the comparison with the regular expression argument that is supplied to the constructor. 如果正则表达式包含用户信息或默认端口号，则所有传入s 将无法与正则表达式匹配。If the regular expression contains user information or the default port number, then all incoming s will fail to match the regular expression. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建的新实例使用。The following example demonstrates how to create a new instance of using a . 其他主机添加到连接和接受的列表。Additional hosts are added to the connect and accept list of . 最后，连接并接受列表显示到控制台。Finally, the connect and accept list are displayed to the console. [!code-cpp[WebPermission_Regex#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebPermission_Regex/CPP/regex.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebPermission_Regex#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebPermission_Regex/CS/regex.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebPermission_Regex#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebPermission_Regex/VB/regex.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值`state`参数可以是或分别生成完全受限制或完全无限制地访问所有安全变量。The value of the `state` parameter is either or , respectively yielding fully restricted or fully unrestricted access to all security variables. 如果指定，然后你可让访问单个 Uri 使用。If you specify , then you can give access to individual URIs using . ## Examples 下面的示例创建的实例和提供访问权限分配给特定的 Url。The following example creates an instance of and gives access rights to specific URLs. span.span: indicates that the application is allowed to accept connections from the Internet on a local resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数初始化并授予其目标权限，或者允许远程主机连接或接受使用所描述的 URI 的远程主机连接`uriRegex`参数。This constructor initializes a and grants its target permission to either make a remote host connection or accept a remote host connection using the URI described by the `uriRegex` parameter. > [!NOTE] > 建议你创建`uriRegex`使用， ，和标志。It is recommended that you create `uriRegex` using the , , and flags. > [!NOTE] > 根据相关的正则表达式列表检查候选 URI 字符串 (或) 两种方式。A candidate URI string is checked against the list of relevant regular expressions ( or ) in two ways. 首先，根据相应的列表中; 检查候选 URI 字符串然后，如果没有匹配项，则候选 URI 字符串转换为和相应的列表进行比照。First, the candidate URI string is checked against the appropriate list; then, if there is no match, the candidate URI string is converted into a and checked against the appropriate list. ## Examples 下面的示例创建的新实例使用指定的连接权限。The following example creates a new instance of with connect rights for the specified . remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性获取的本地资源，由此允许列表。This property gets a list of local resources permitted by this . 已应用的类仅有权接收到此列表中找到的本地资源的传入连接。The class to which you have applied only has permission to receive an incoming connection to local resources found in this list. > [!NOTE] > 你可以将 Uri 添加到此列表使用。You can add URIs to this list using . > [!NOTE] > 根据相关的正则表达式列表检查候选 URI 字符串 (或) 两种方式。A candidate URI string is checked against the list of relevant regular expressions ( or ) in two ways. 首先，根据相应的列表中; 检查候选 URI 字符串然后，如果没有匹配项，则候选 URI 字符串转换为和相应的列表进行比照。First, the candidate URI string is checked against the appropriate list; then, if there is no match, the candidate URI string is converted into a and checked against the appropriate list. ## Examples 下面的示例输出中的 Url到控制台。The following example prints the URLs in the to the console. span.span: Adds the specified URI string with the specified access rights to the current .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已指定作为，使用以允许使用`uriString`目标类中。If you have specified as the , use to permit the use of `uriString` in the target class. 方式`uriString`可以使用目标类指定通过`access`。The way that `uriString` can be used by the target class is specified by `access`. 指定作为要添加指定的 URI 的访问参数`uriString`到 URI 列表的参数接受字符串，或指定参数来将 URI 添加到的 URI 的列表为访问连接字符串。Specify as the access parameter to add the URI specified by the `uriString` parameter to the list of URI accept strings, or specify as the access parameter to add the URI to the list of URI connect strings. > [!NOTE] > 调用上将不起作用，因为所有 Uri 都授予的权限。Calling on will have no effect, because permission is granted to all URIs. > [!NOTE] > 根据相关的正则表达式列表检查候选 URI 字符串 (或) 两种方式。A candidate URI string is checked against the list of relevant regular expressions ( or ) in two ways. 首先，根据相应的列表中; 检查候选 URI 字符串然后，如果没有匹配项，则候选 URI 字符串转换为和相应的列表进行比照。First, the candidate URI string is checked against the appropriate list; then, if there is no match, the candidate URI string is converted into a and checked against the appropriate list. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何添加对特定的 URL 字符串的访问权限。The following example demonstrates how to add access rights to particular URL strings. [!code-cpp[WebPermission_Intersect#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebPermission_Intersect/CPP/webpermission_intersect.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[WebPermission_Intersect#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebPermission_Intersect/CS/webpermission_intersect.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebPermission_Intersect#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebPermission_Intersect/VB/webpermission_intersect.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已指定作为，使用以允许使用`uriRegex`目标类中。If you have specified as the , use to allow the use of `uriRegex` in the target class. 指定作为`access`参数将添加指定的 URI`uriRegex`到 URI 列表的参数接受字符串，或指定参数来将 URI 添加到的 URI 的列表为访问连接字符串。Specify as the `access` parameter to add the URI specified by the `uriRegex` parameter to the list of URI accept strings, or specify as the access parameter to add the URI to the list of URI connect strings. > [!NOTE] > 调用上实例将产生任何影响，如权限授予所有 Uri。Calling on an instance will have no effect as permission is granted to all URIs. > [!NOTE] > 建议你创建`uriRegex`使用， ，和标志。It is recommended that you create `uriRegex` using the , , and flags. > [!NOTE] > 根据相关的正则表达式列表检查候选 URI 字符串 (或) 两种方式。A candidate URI string is checked against the list of relevant regular expressions ( or ) in two ways. 首先，根据相应的列表中; 检查候选 URI 字符串然后，如果没有匹配项，则候选 URI 字符串转换为和相应的列表进行比照。First, the candidate URI string is checked against the appropriate list; then, if there is no match, the candidate URI string is converted into a and checked against the appropriate list. ## Examples 下面的示例使用访问权限授予指定的 URI。The following example uses to give access rights for the specified URI.
